code: import*as modalTypes from'./../constants/modal';export var showModal=function showModal(){return{type:modalTypes.SHOW_MODAL};};export var hideModal=function hideModal(){return{type:modalTypes.HIDE_MODAL};};export var changeModalTitle=function changeModalTitle(title){return{type:modalTypes.CHANGE_MODAL_TITLE,payload:{title:title}};};export var changeModalContent=function changeModalContent(component){return{type:modalTypes.CHANGE_MODAL_CONTENT,payload:{component:component}};};
